src:
3 durugista arestado
03 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Melnie Ragasa-Jimena
Arestado sa mga awtoridad ang tatlong sinasabing tulak ng droga sa isinagawang buy-bust operation ng mga pulis ng Batasan Police Station 6 ng Quezon City, kamakalawa ng gabi.
Ang tatlo ay kinilalang sina Ayzel Jay Santos, 30, Mhel Lyka Santos, 28 at Alvin Macapagat, 36, na pawang residente ng Mendez St. sa Baesa, Quezon City.
Dinakma ang tatlo dakong alas-7 ng gabi habang aktong inaabot ang halagang P1,000 shabu sa isang pulis na nagkunwaring buyer.
Nakuha sa mga suspek ang 20 gramo ng shabu na nagkakahalaga ng P136,000 atÂ  ginamit na buy-bust money.
Ang nasabing operasyon ay ginawa ng Station Drug Enforcement Unit ng Police Station 6 ng Quezon City Police District (QCPD) bunsod na rin ng tip na ibinigay ng mga residente sa lugar.
Inihahanda ang kasong paglabag sa Republic Act 9165 o Comprehensive Dangerous Drugs Act of 2002 na isasampa laban sa mga suspek.
text:
3 durugista arrested
03 Nov 2019, 10:59 by Melnie Ragasa-Jimena
Authorities arrested three suspected drug pushers during a police buy-bust operation at Batasan Police Station 6 in Quezon City last night.
The three were identified as Ayzel Jay Santos, 30, Mhel Lyka Santos, 28 and Alvin Macapagat, 36, all residents of Mendez St. in Baesa, Quezon City.
The three were arrested around 7pm while they allegedly handed the P1,000 shabu to a police fraudulent buyer.
The suspects seized 20 grams of shabu worth P136,000 and used buy-bust money.
The operation was carried out by the Police Drug Enforcement Unit of the Police Station 6 of the Quezon City Police District (QCPD) following the tip given by residents in the area.
The case is being prepared for violation of Republic Act 9165 or the Comprehensive Dangerous Drugs Act of 2002 to be filed against the suspects.
